website_summaries.verdict: Artistically designed and quality-crafted apron, part of manufacturer collection.
pros: Apron motif designed in Europe, coordinates with other products in this collection
Inspired by idyllic region in France
cons: Slightly higher price than more basic designs

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: I responded to Maison d' Hermine's email regarding my satisfaction with my purchase of their apron. I let them know that although I loved the apron, I couldn't use it because the ties were too short. Their response, much to my amazement was to send me another apron with longer ties that fit perfectly. I am delighted with this purchase and with their extraordinary customer service. I highly recommend dealing with this company and encouraging others to purchase their quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Serious reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron after ruining my shirt - again - while cooking! I love it. It's very pretty and the fabric is nice and softer than I expected. I have used it and washed it and it comes out of the dryer a bit wrinkled, but not terrible. I bought a second one for a friend and I'm buying another for my mother. They are very attractive and make a nice gift for the cook who already has every gadget, but doesn't buy themselves anything to keep their clothes nice and clean. It's very comfortable to wear. I like the pockets and the adjustable strap around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with small chest!
customer_reviews.text: Nice apron with beautiful floral pattern. I love everything about it besides how unflattering it looks on me...I have a small chest and it is HUGE in that area. It will not lay flat and bunches up in an uncomfortable way. I do not wear it very often for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with my product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with my product, first time received there was some loose stitches. But the seller surprised me with a email saying they were going to replace it for me! I never had a company do that for me without asking or jumping through hoops. I'm very happy with the new one not one thing wrong! Thanks to the company for making my christmas! The pattern is beautiful and i would say the material feels like a canvas, not sure how it washes yet. But im sure it will stand up!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This apron has a beautiful, delicate print. It is of a serviceable weight, has a nice deep pocket, and contrary to some posts, the ties are more than long enough to tied in front. In addition to all this the price is very reasonable compared to many other aprons I have seen that are much thinner and not as nice. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andyee Dufreyne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful apron!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful apron it is! I know some people were asking if it could be tied in the back and in the front - for me (usually wear petite petite, XXS), yes. With the temperature rising up to the 90s, this apron was the perfect thickness - not too thin so that stains would go through but not too thick that air wouldn't go through. I would recommend washing it before wearing to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Homes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Serviceable Apron
customer_reviews.text: A lovely apron. The adjustable neck tie is actually a very nice touch- it makes a convenient loop to hang the apron on the wall, and makes slipping into chef mode a cinch. Well made and thick enough material to serve its purpose. I couldn't ask for more. Regarding sizing, it sits about 2 inches above the knee on one who is 5' 5", and fits well enough on both slender and curvy forms (long back straps and a generous enough amount of cloth make this possible).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love! Beautiful Quality Aprons & Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Quality of fabric (main & straps), stitching and floral print exceed expectations. Even more beautiful than product images. I purchased 2 Colmar aprons for family members after receiving one as a gift myself. I mentioned a minor issue due to packaging to the Manufacturer (Seller) after receiving a follow up email regarding my satisfaction with the items; their Customer Service immediately responded saying they would send replacements (I was not even expecting a reply let alone such a generous offer). The replacements were sent overnight over the weekend from overseas! The professionalism and kindness of their Customer Service is beyond reproach, and I look forward to ordering more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell but Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful apron and looks very durable. Only problem was it came with an awful sour cheese smell. I bought it for a gift but decided it would have to be washed so washed and ironed it and slipped it back inside the packaging. Was glad the smell at least washed out!!
customer_reviews.author: amk+3

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: It looks very beautiful on the picture, but it`s one of those amazon purchases when it disappoints you in real life. I was hoping for a cotton, durable apron that I`m going to use for years, but this thing is thin, the material feels like plastic and it won`t last. It`s also not soft, so it looks weird on a body. The top is way to wide, so it turns into a weird-looking shape... too bad, I was really excited about this one
customer_reviews.author: Dusia

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely is the perfect word to describe them! They are exquisitely beautiful, the quality, the designs, just everything is great. Even the packaging was lovely. Please don’t change and become like other companies which start great and then begin to make their products mediocre at a lower cost to make a larger profit. I haven’t been so happy with a purchase in so long because most of the time when you received the item it is nothing like the pictures or the descriptions but this was such a happy surprise. I love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive apron, nicely soft fabric, and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty apron. Had been looking for a nice blue one in the stores for ages before I found this one on Amazon. Perfect for me as I love blue and white china and have lots in my home. The fabric is not too stiff like some aprons, and is comfortable to wear. I will definitely be back to treat myself to another one, and probably more of this company’s products.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Must iron after washing
customer_reviews.text: Hi I loved this apron until I washed it. What made it super well-built was the super amount of starch in the fabric. So it gave an illusion that it was well-built. After I washed and dried it, the fabric wrinkled all over the place to the point where I must iron it to look good again, even the hem curled. So the fabric wasn't well-built it was the amount of starch in the product that gave it the well-built feeling. The fabric is not well-built after washing. It is just a run of the mill apron, but with an exceptional print.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Lightweight Apron
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron. It's lightweight and comfortable, and sooo cute. It holds up very well in the wash and I certainly would have no hesitation about buying this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, seems well-made
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Has a bit of an odd smell initially, and the adjustment at the neck seems like it would work better if it was reversed so the slack part of the strap would point down instead of up. I'm guessing this is how all aprons are constructed but I am not sure as this is the first time I've purchased an adjustable apron. I would also note that it seems to be made for someone slightly taller (I'm about 5'5). But that causes no issues for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful apron!  Amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this apron! I purchased their kitchen towels (birds on a wire) and loved them so much. When I saw this same company had aprons, I was finished my search - I knew I was getting one of theirs. The only problem? They're all so beautiful and it was hard to choose. So, I'll be ordering a few more in the future. I would definitely recommend these! By the way, after I ordered mine I was watching a lady on youtube (who happens to be one of my favorite homemakers) and she was wearing the exact apron I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: denise jolley

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this apron. Material is not stiff and will only soften the more I use and wash it. The adjustable buckle is kinda strange. I feel like it may be upside down and not very easy to figure out. Also not a very tight fasteners by, either. Will have to see how it behaves after 6+ hours of continuous use. I may just stitch the “head loop” to the top of the bib portion. (You know what I’m trying to say!) LOL. I purchased two aprons and a matching pack of napkins. Very pretty design.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie-Lyn Denison

customer_reviews.title: Work of Art
customer_reviews.text: These aprons, like all “Maison” products I’ve seen, are true works of art. I often have a call to wear aprons publically as a sous chef for a heart program and for large church events. I wear this one with great pride; it looks individually hand painted, and the “House” label is there “en Francaise” for all to see. I even took it to my Bible study to show off. I know it’s a vanity, but pretty innocent as vanities go, n’est-ce pas?
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable neck loop
customer_reviews.text: Quality fabric, huge pocket, and the print is just beautiful. My biggest peeve with aprons is not being able to adjust the neck loop. This apron solved that issue. This would truly fit just about anyone of adult size, and be a favorite gift. Machine washable for the win.
customer_reviews.author: contrary_weasel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this apron as part of a thank you gift for a friend who has been to France many times and is fluent in French. Although I think this apron was a bit pricey, it’s made really well, it’s very soft and absolutely beautiful. The size is correct, unlike one that I ordered for a different friend that was too small and I had to send it back. It was a perfect part of her gift, and I’m happy to recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex :-)

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this apron
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this apron! The colors are vibrant and gorgeous. The material is thick without being stiff. I worried about it being way too long as I am only 5' tall but it hits me at the knees; so it is acceptable to me as I am used to things being a little longer on me. I am able to tie it in the front if I wished and I am a full figured gal. It seems to be very well made. I just received it so I have only used it once. I will update after I wash it a couple times. I will absolutely recommend to friends and be buying others for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grutzmacher

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful apron and has all the features you need: adjustable neck, pockets, and strings long enough to wrap around you to the front unless your waist is larger than (guessing) 44 inches. It's made with care, no raw edges of cloth showing to fray after washing. I haven't had to wash it yet but I don't see why it wouldn't wash beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weisbeck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is well constructed. The fabric is sturdy, but flexible. I really like the adjustable neck strap, the long ties and the generous width of this apron. No more flour covered or grease splattered tops. I think it would also work for potters, crafters, or artists. I highly recommend this apron to anyone in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Lovely apron.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely apron. Material, size, and stitching are quite nice. The front pocket gapes open so have had it sewn in half so the things in the pocket don't fall out. The material is thick enough to prevent splatters from cooking to get on your clothes. But thin enough that it doesn't feel like a butcher's apron. The apron adds a splash of colour to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust91

customer_reviews.title: Truly wonderful in design and quality of fabric
customer_reviews.text: The best of all my aprons! The quality of fabric is solid cotton; durable. The design is what you see in the photo. It needs ironing after wash unless you take it out of washer immediately. 100% cotton. That means we can wipe our hands on it. The design and colors makes me look like an artist when wearing it. Ordered me a second one.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: what a fun little gift apron 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous gift for my prim and proper coworker who loves aprons and having her femininity affirmed and celebrated! The print is beautiful, the colors just pop, and I kind of want one for myself! I could see some of these prints given to the wrong person becoming a funny little prank 🙃
customer_reviews.author: SnakeChase

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and practical
customer_reviews.text: Got this apron for my middle school age granddaughter who is has been exploring baking during COVID. Design is very appealing and size just small enough to fit her 5’1” frame, though would definitely work any size up from there. I like that the different designs have different front pocket(s) possibilities. She loves hers.
customer_reviews.author: Salem Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Chic and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and love the huge pocket on the front and soft cotton material. This design reminded me of the aprons my mom used to wear so it had a nostalgic feel that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend he loves it. Uses it every time he bakes. Bigger guy so this will fit a plus sized person easily.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off a wedding registry, but I'm one of those people who like to buy the prettier things off of a registry (as well as checks reviews so I make sure not to buy something she will have to return). This item checked off both items. The print is beautiful and the quality is good. I think the bride is really going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melany Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fabric
customer_reviews.text: I always wear an apron in the kitchen, and this apron is one of the nicest I have ever owned. The fabric is just the right weight, not too thin or too stiff, a nice medium weight. The choice of prints was difficult to choose from. I loved so many of them, but finally chose the floral love and it is very pretty. The adjustable neckstrap is easy to use, and is what I prefer . It has a very nice big pocket, tho I personally don't need a pocket on any apron. Over all, it is a very very nice apron , and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: janice hall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap aprons!
customer_reviews.text: These aprons are made from thin, cheap material! Plus they aren't made well at all. The huge pocket in front just gets in the way. I will not buy anymore ever! I won't even donate these aprons to the Goodwill or Salvation Army. They are very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy Evening

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron as a gift for my mom and it did not disappoint. It was even more beautiful in person than in the picture. The front pocket was sewn so the the pattern lined up and was not interrupted, a sign of quality in my mind. The fabric is soft and the ties are adjustable. I will be ordering one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Moopy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a shorty, so I appreciate an adjustable neck. Neck is not a tie, so it doesn't come undone either. Nice sized pockets. Easy to wash. This seems extremely durable. After an extensive search to replace my favorite apron, I decided on this one. It's a great choice! Added plus - I can purchase matching kitchen towels, oven mitts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: dinosaursprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! You won’t be disappointed 👍
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and high quality too! I love the pretty color m, it’s a soft fabric and the fit is adjustable. I liked it so much I ordered another apron, along with some hand towels and oven mitts. Makes a great gift as well. Extremely versatile purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Alt Parry

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like to iron!
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my previous review. This has been such a disappointment. When you wash it, it curls up into a small, lumpy ball. Must be vigorously ironed each time it is washed. Really a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Smitten with kittens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea! Light weight fits plus sized people.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift idea! I bought this for myself. I am a plus size woman and it fit perfectly. I was concerned because the picture doesn't do it Justice at all. Extra bonus it has pockets and the strap around your neck is adjustable. Did I also mention that it is very light weight. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: FaithEllen

customer_reviews.title: Great plus size apron.
customer_reviews.text: Great apron! Fits any size. I am a women's size 4x or 28 and it fits with plenty of room for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The birds are really pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I wear an apron all day, every day, so I bought three. Each one gets washed at least twice a week. Finger press when they come out of the wash, hang to dry and they look like I ironed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Mom Loved this apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Mother's Day. It was just as described but even prettier in person. Really well made, very light weight and soft. The adjustable neck was a huge plus. My Mom is very petite and fit very well. Highly recommend. Much better than the uber heavy ones with the tie neck.
customer_reviews.author: Abbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my friend
customer_reviews.text: My friend described the perfect apron she hoped to find. In all our shopping trips the aprons were too heavy or too long, never just perfect. I loved finding this apron to surprise her with on her birthday. Guess what it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: elecat

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gardening...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy apron with pocket(s) to use for gardening. The fact that this is denim colored was misleading. It's actually made of a rather thin material and there is just the one big floppy pocket. I was hoping to put my hand shears in there, but no dice. It's also enormous. The flower print is cute enough, but if I wanted a sewing project I wouldn't have ordered and apron. Oh well, you live and you learn.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I received this apron within a week from purchase. It is everything I hoped it would be. Sewn very well, sturdy, soft cotton fabric and the pattern and colors are lovely. Soft pastels, warm colors, like a painting. I will remember this for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this and one other one for my mom and they are the perfect length. My mom is warm around the middle and this fits her perfect. The work in the detail is so beautiful!! Definitely a good buy for anyone who loves to be in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a joke slogan apron or a boring white one - this one is lovely, fits really well, and very practical. So practical that my husband used it for cooking at a party - he didn't care about the flowers, he liked that it covered well and the ties were long enough. Had to buy him a "manly" one so I could get my apron back!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth ordering !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This apron fell apart before I even wore it! Washed it first! Don't waste your money!! I would have returned it but live 50 miles from UPS store and that's how they want it returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful apron
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful print and material. The bib gapped, which annoyed me no end, but two tucks on either side where the bib bmeets the straps solved that problem. Wish it had pockets but that's my error in picking an apron w/o them. Gave 4 instead of 5 because of the gapping but all in all a lovely apron. I am a happy camper. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dennick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fabric and super cute bird design:
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron. It is made of a wonderful fabric. It may wrinkle a little with the first washing, but the fabric seem to relax after a few washings. I love the bird design and the trim is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Artist

customer_reviews.title: Nice Apron.
customer_reviews.text: Borderline on the thickness of this material but will do nicely in my kitchen which is why I gave it a 4. A bit wrinkled when it came out the packaging though a steam iron cleaned up the wrinkles nicely. Cute print.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a pretty apron for anything, but I especially like it because it looks like watercolor art on it and I'm a watercolor painter. The cloth is soft and the flowers bright. It's just very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful apron, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and color. What I don’t like is that its a little big across the chest. The cut of the material could have been done better in the chest area to make it more flattering. Nothing beats the Style of aprons from Korea and Japan!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the print!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length and cut. Excellent design, just as pictured. I would give a 5 star rating but the fabric had an awful putrid odor out of the package...I'll have to wash it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it...the fabric is top quality and the roosters are too --- the pocket it great - my only criticism would be that the ties are too short to do a front tie that I prefer - A great apron otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Horn

customer_reviews.title: adjustible neck
customer_reviews.text: I's pretty, durable material yet light weight. I especially like the adjustable neck. Haven't had it long so haven't washed it yet so don't know how wrinkled it will get or how stains will set in on it. But it's great to slip on over my dress clothes at the end of a work day to cook a quick supper. Lost my set of aprons in the Hurricane Harvey flooding. This is my first replacement apron.
customer_reviews.author: Gen-Rev

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really pretty apron that would definitely make a pretty gift. I have not used it enough to comment on whether it is easy to clean, but it is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Caiazzo

customer_reviews.title: Thinner material than what I expected. All my other ...
customer_reviews.text: Thinner material than what I expected. All my other aprons have had long enough waist ties to twist around the back and tie in the front. The ties are too short on this apron which is disappointing for me
customer_reviews.author: rosem

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is absolutely beautiful, the only bad thing is that it definitely needs to be ironed after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sags.
customer_reviews.text: The pocket made the apron sag when I put my small clippers in it. I was using it as an apron while arranging flowers. Point of the pocket is to hold things. Looked untidy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S. Houser

customer_reviews.title: This beautiful apron protects your clothes at meals and during craft projects!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a retirement home for elderly residents. I bought this apron for myself and as a gift for another resident. It is absolutely beautiful and we enjoy wearing it at meals. It is very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, lightweight and adjustable straps.  Fits well for plus size girls
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. Plus, there are lots of other items that you can purchase in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter. It is a nice quality apron and a very feminine pattern, I'm sure she will enjoy using this during her cooking adventures for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kind1

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful apron on top of good workmanship and durability. I have yet to wash the apron because I just got it. The neck strap is an easy adjustment and I like the length- long of the apron. I would recommend this to anyone who uses aprons in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Print
customer_reviews.text: I'd needed a new apron for years...even my husband mentioned it! This is the nicest I've ever had and it looks so pretty hanging in my kitchen. Love the pockets! I bought one for my twelve-year-old granddaughter, too, since she enjoys cooking with Grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Mztpeg

customer_reviews.title: I want ten of these!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the most gorgeous design ever! I love everything they have in their line. The apron is perfect and great for practical usage. Cleans really easily too!
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an apron for my toddler and stumbled across this one. I bought it for myself on impulse because the design is so lovely and I haven’t been disappointed! The design is just as nice in person and the quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Good quality apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is beautiful and durable. Really pleased with the size and the quality of material used. Haven't had to clean it yet so not sure how easy that will be.
customer_reviews.author: Ms dj

customer_reviews.title: Cute apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron fits great and the ties are long enough to wrap around to the front. The design is really cute. I am 5'4" 130 lbs and it is perfect for me. Very stylish. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron. I use it myself but it would make a lovely gift because it comes wrapped in a pretty package and it’s such a lovely design.
customer_reviews.author: SW Author

customer_reviews.title: Very nice apron
customer_reviews.text: Very nice apron. It’s not coated so you will get wet if you’re washing dishes. It washes fine, but I hang dry it. It looks best after a light ironing, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jen N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apron!
customer_reviews.text: This apron is wonderful. I can adjust the front (I am short waisted). The apron is made of a wonderful weight of cotton - not stiff or wispy. I have realized the value of wearing an apron when I cook after ruining a favorite dress. This apron has excellent proportions for all coverage...and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty J

customer_reviews.title: The apron is very pretty and seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: The apron is very pretty and seems sturdy enough. It has a bit of a chemical, musty smell when first out of the plastic sleeve, but it airs out fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful apron is soft and luxurious yet practical with 2 pockets and long ties for comfort. This would make a fabulous gift for any cook!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Beth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and well-made apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is very attractive and the fabric is of high quality. I'm very happy with it. I'm really writing to let people know that the apron is much longer than it looks in the photo. I'm average height, but I double the apron up partially so that it doesn't go over my knees. The apron ties are quite long too, which is fine for me. I cross them behind my back and tie them in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! When I pulled it out of packaging I ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! When I pulled it out of packaging I was pleased that it looked even better in person and has a quality feel to it. Love love it!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful subtle watercolor flowers.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for a teenager with a cookbook. Then I saw another apron more suitable for her so I kept it and love wearing it. Practical as well as very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Klotz

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This apron is beyond beautiful! The colors and fabric are gorgeous! I have multiple items by thisbrand and they are all stunning!
customer_reviews.author: debra smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a very nice apron.
customer_reviews.text: This apron is well made of nice material with beautiful pattern. I just didn’t care for the pocket...It’s kind of wide and maybe would be better with a little Velcro so it stays flush. I plan to sew through the center making it two pockets. I do love the adjustable neck strap!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional - Great as Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift to my Father in Law, he was very pleased and will hopefully get some good use out of it! Design/colors exactly as pictured. The apron comes folded in a plastic package, easy to gift wrap as is. Apron is 100% cotton, easily adjustable and holds up great in the wash. Everything you want in an apron. Superb product, 100% recommend!

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was expecting. Its beautiful and the material is thick and seems like it will wipe off very easlily

customer_reviews.text: This apron is the prettiest...that's for sure. It's a really soft cotton and comfortable to wear!! Five stars⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I got it. It's sturdy and absorbs water so well (easiest way to dry your hands when washing dishes or cooking). The design was a plus. I love how subtle the colors are and how refreshing it looks. The size of the front pockets are great and the length of the apron itself is perfect... just lovely.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the prettiest aprons I have ever bought. I love aprons and these are the best! Well made and the color schemes are wonderful! Very good company.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought Apron
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a Spain flair apron but, didn't find one online. Had my eye on this apron for sometime and decided to buy. Glad I did it is very pretty! So, pretty I almost do not want to wear it while cooking; for fear of staining! hehe Perfect fit as well.

customer_reviews.title: Chicken mania
customer_reviews.text: I gave this chicken patterned apron & 2 matching hot pads as a gift to a relative that collects ceramic chickens. She was so excited to receive this and she said it was well made. The gift was a huge success.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. I love it! Very nice quality, well made and the colors are so soft. We live on a river so I thought the fish would be perfect. I am 5'11"and found this apron to be the perfect length for me (right at my knees when tied). It really would be a long apron for a short person.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and get lots of nice comments about ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and get lots of nice comments about it (I worked in a flower shop), Once it is washed, it does seem to go fairly limp but it didn't shrink. I guess I just have to iron it the next time if I want it to stay crisp looking.
customer_reviews.author: kathy kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Apron
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed this on Prime Day. The apron is absolutely lovely! I gave it to my mother as a gift, so I am unable to comment on the durability or comfort, but I can say that at the very least, she was delighted by how very pretty it was.

customer_reviews.title: Spot on.
customer_reviews.text: Your aprons are by far better than others I have purchased in the past. Very well made, good fabric and lovely prints. Excellent quality. The fit is spot on. Thanks! Puyallup WA.

customer_reviews.title: Bought As A Gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife has recently started baking a lot of cakes and my children and I decided to buy this for her to use in the kitchen. We used fabric paint to add their handprints and gold sharpie to add their names. The colors are very nice on the apron and my wife likes the fit and quality of the apron. I would definitely recommend to anyone who would like to buy this as a gift for someone who bakes.

product_meta.title: Maison d' Hermine Colmar 100% Cotton 1 Piece Kitchen Apron with an Adjustable Neck & Visible Center Pocket with Long Ties for Women Men | Chef (27.50"x31.50")
feature_bullets: SIZE: Generous fit, works for men and women with the long waist ties and a adjustable neck strap. Each apron width is 27.50" and the length is 31.50"
EASY CARE & MAINTENANCE: Machine wash warm with like colors, do not bleach, tumble dry low and warm iron if needed.

PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 Apron with the long waist ties and an adjustable neck strap. Made from 100% cotton, each product in this collection is just as elegant and charming it can be and brings out the spirit of the warm season in an artsy way. Our products are Designed in Europe and Made in India.

UNIQUE DESIGN: This delicate collection is inspired by the beautiful town of Colmar, in the Northeast of France - also known as 'Little Venice. With its ancient houses and flower-decked town center, this land of wines is idyllic. The 'Colmar' collection for 'Maison d' Hermine' captures the essence of this picturesque place with its dainty flower prints that glide on white cotton fabric.

MULTIPLE USES: Apart from cooking, the apron gives great protection while using dishwasher, washing your dogs or trimming the yard. It is comfortable to wear and has an adjustable neck strap, so you can choose the perfect height for you. Once you are done, rinse or use a soapy cloth to get the grime off.
